# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

message(STATUS "Setting up module " parallel)

FILE(GLOB gensources
     "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/src/parallel/*.cpp")

FILE(GLOB genheaders
     "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/include/IMP/parallel/*.h")

include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})
add_definitions("-DIMPPARALLEL_EXPORTS")

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${PARALLEL_CXX_FLAGS}")

set(headers )

if(DEFINED IMP_PARALLEL_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES)
  set_source_files_properties(${IMP_PARALLEL_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
                              PROPERTIES GENERATED 1)
endif()

if(DEFINED IMP_parallel_IS_PER_CPP)
  set(sources )

  add_library(imp_parallel ${IMP_LIB_TYPE} ${gensources} ${genheaders}
              ${headers} ${sources}
              ${IMP_PARALLEL_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
              )
else()

  add_library(imp_parallel ${IMP_LIB_TYPE} ${gensources} ${genheaders}
              ${headers} ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/src/parallel_all.cpp
              ${IMP_PARALLEL_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
              )

endif()
INSTALL(TARGETS imp_parallel DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR})

foreach(d IMP_PARALLEL_LIBRARY_EXTRA_DEPENDENCIES)
  add_dependencies(imp_parallel ${d})
endforeach(d)

target_link_libraries(imp_parallel
                      ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY} ${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
                      ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES} ${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES} ${CGAL_LIBRARIES} ${ANN_LIBRARIES}
  )

set(IMP_PARALLEL_LIBRARY imp_parallel CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)
